endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of customer interactions over a specified time period.
Submit data to analyze and update subscriber trend metrics.
Access aggregated feedback regarding various services provided.
Identify services with the highest customer adherence for promotional focus.
Submit parameters to generate customized promotional strategies.
Retrieve detailed usage statistics of services over various regions.
Send customer feedback data to analyze satisfaction and improvements.
Obtain insights into service adoption trends with prediction capabilities.
Remove information regarding services marked as obsolete.
Update and maintain detailed information about available services.
